Incidentally i just realized i think im the first person to fly a Space plane at Gilly.

well you're not and im sure im not either and i have flown to guilly multiple times the first being in .15 if i remember correctly... im pretty sure it was .15 at least

^.^ have you ever flown a 15 part part plane into orbit? i have a 25 part craft able to go to gilly and a 20 part craft that will land either vertical or horizontal

i hope you can help me im looking for someone who knows about small SSTO's i seem to not be able to find any lol.
